title: Road hazard
creator_credit: Peter D'Andrea, Peter Tremlett and M A P S
brief_description: A young couple driving through the country side wonder who has been playing funny business with the road signs as they are warned to look out for everything from koalas to kangaroos, to ants, to aliens to Elvis. Cast includes Melissa Robinson, Liam McEvoy and Peter D’Andrea.
